meanings.definition: To determine the total of something.
meanings.sent1: She totalizes the number of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The cashier totalizes the cost of the groceries.
meanings.sent3: The teacher totalizes the scores on the test with a smile.
meanings.sent4: His love for her totalizes all other emotions.
meanings.sent5: The accountant totalizes the expenses meticulously.

meanings.definition: To bring together all parts to form a whole.
meanings.sent1: The chef totalizes the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The architect totalizes the blueprints for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The children totalize their toys to create a game.
meanings.sent4: Music totalizes the emotions of the scene in the movie.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle totalizes the pieces into a beautiful picture.
